title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: February 01, 2023, 04:36:17 PMLast edit: February 02, 2023, 02:35:12 PM by minerjones
content: LOT 1: Bicycle x Avtones NFT playing card deckOfficial link: https://bicyclecards.com/nfts/*Deck has been opened. Winner will also receive the official NFT. They will need to supply an ETH addressSTARTING BID: 0.0060BTCLOT 2: 2020 Bitcoin Tram from the Bitcoin Association of Hong Kong #110/210Official link: https://www.bitcoin.org.hk/2020-bitcoin-tram/*Fun fact: Tram #110 along with #33 and #138 were the 3 trams selected to wear this bitcoin look for the event, making this tram toy #110 even more special!! STARTING BID: 0.0050BTCLOT 3: CryptoKaiju Halloween Celebration and SpangleToys have an NFC tag you can scan to get information about your KaijuOfficial website: https://cryptokaiju.io/Official explorer: https://dapp.cryptokaiju.io/*Winner will need to supply an ETH address for the 2x NFTs, 1 of each figureSTARTING BID: 0.0100BTCLOT 4: Floatoshi Quackimoto rubber duck from Voltage Goat3 Lots availableSTARTING BID PER DUCK: 0.0003BTCLOT 5: Bitcoin Bull statue, 8x5x5 inches, resinReplica of the giant one featured at BTC 2022 in Miami!!*Note: one of the statue's feet have some small holes from original shipping (picture below)*Please take that into consideration when bidding2 Lots availableSTARTING BID PER BULL: 0.0003BTC**Lot 4 and Lot 5 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-lot multi-item auctionsLOT 1LOT 2LOT 3LOT 4LOT 5STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER ITEM: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: FEBRUARY 6th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: sweeteye
comments.created_time: February 01, 2023, 05:24:51 PMLast edit: February 01, 2023, 06:21:09 PM by sweeteye

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Not sure if I got it right from their website:Lot 1 comes with ONE unique deck of cards in the form of an NFT? So, 8008 physical decks were sold, each coming with a unique NFT attached or how exactly are the numbers here? Also a link to the NFTs on opensea or similar would be much appreciated.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: sweeteye on February 01, 2023, 05:24:51 PMLot 1 - 0.006Lot 4 - 2 @ 0.003 0.0003 (thanks @PreciousMetapsICT)Quote from: haloxon on February 01, 2023, 06:00:28 PMlot 4: 1x 0.0003Quote from: MrMojoRising26 on February 02, 2023, 01:16:03 AMLot 51@ 0.0003 BTCCurrent high bidsQuote from: Kryptowerk on February 02, 2023, 04:05:29 PMNot sure if I got it right from their website:Lot 1 comes with ONE unique deck of cards in the form of an NFT? So, 8008 physical decks were sold, each coming with a unique NFT attached or how exactly are the numbers here? Also a link to the NFTs on opensea or similar would be much appreciated.You will get the physical deck and the NFT of the deck.Here is link to the NFTs:https://opensea.io/collection/kolectiv?search[stringTraits][0][name]=Total%20Minted&search[stringTraits][0][values][0]=8008&search[sortAscending]=true&search[sortBy]=UNIT_PRICEThe NFTs don't seem to be unique besides their numbering corresponding to the physical deck numberThere 32 unique NFTs that were randomly inserted in the 8008 decks to replace the standard deck NFTAnd looks like there were 24 unique collector ones also
